import src.resource from src.util.imaging import VDOM_imaging class VDOM_horizonmenu(VDOM_object): def compute(self): self.pagesid = [] menuhead =[] menufoot=[] self.selectedfiles = [] self.rolloverfiles= [] self.imagefiles=[] self.imgheight=[] self.imgwidth=[] self.modules=[] im1 = VDOM_imaging() self.headwidth =0 self.headheight =0 self.footwidth =0 self.footheight =0 if self.menuheader and self.menuheader != "": menuhead =self.menuheader.split(',') im1.load(request.application_id, menuhead[0]) self.headheight = (str(im1.size[1])) self.headwidth =(str(im1.size[0])) self.imgheight.append(self.headheight) self.imgwidth.append(self.headwidth) self.imagefiles.append(menuhead[0]) self.pagesid.append(("","menuheader")) self.selectedfiles.append("") if len(menuhead)==2: self.rolloverfiles.append(menuhead[1]) else: self.rolloverfiles.append("") if self.menufooter and self.menufooter != "": menufoot = self.menufooter.split(',') im1.load(request.application_id,menufoot[0]) self.footheight = (str(im1.size[1])) self.footwidth =(str(im1.size[0])) self.imgheight.append(self.footheight) self.imgwidth.append(self.footwidth) self.imagefiles.append(menufoot[0]) self.pagesid.append(("","menufooter")) self.selectedfiles.append("") if len(menufoot)==2: self.rolloverfiles.append(menufoot[1]) else: self.rolloverfiles.append("") if self.pages: for item in self.pages.split(';'): (idpage,res1,res2,res3) = (item[1:-1]).split(',') self.pagesid.append((idpage,request.application().search_object(idpage).attributes.title)) self.modules.append(idpage) self.imagefiles.append(res1) im1.load(request.application_id, res1) self.imgheight.append(str(im1.size[1])) self.imgwidth.append(str(im1.size[0])) self.rolloverfiles.append(res2) self.selectedfiles.append(res3) def render(self,parent, contents=""): if self.visible == "1" and self.pages and self.menufooter and self.menuheader: if self.pagesid and len(self.imagefiles) != len(self.pagesid) or (self.rolloverfiles and len(self.rolloverfiles) != len(self.selectedfiles)): debug("*******len%s %s"%(len(self.imagefiles),len(self.pagesid))) return "" import src.util visited={} queue=[] current = request.application().search_object(request.container_id) current_sel=current.id current_id=current.id app_map = request.application().app_map if self.level in app_map and current: currentlevel = app_map[self.level] try: while current_id not in self.modules: visited[current_id]=True currentitem = currentlevel.level_map[current_id] for parent in currentitem.parents: if parent.id not in visited: queue.append(parent.id) current_id=queue.pop(0) current_sel=current_id except IndexError: current_sel = None menuitem_img ="" for i in xrange(0,(len(self.pagesid))): representation = "" if self.imagefiles: linkres = src.util.id.id2link1(str(self.imagefiles[i])) if self.rolloverfiles and self.rolloverfiles[i] != "": onmouse = " OnMouseOver=\"this.src=\'"+src.util.id.id2link1(self.rolloverfiles[i])+"\'\" OnMouseOut=\"this.src=\'"+src.util.id.id2link1(self.imagefiles[i])+"\'\"" else: onmouse = "" if self.pagesid[i][1]=="menuheader": menuleft="""#scrollable a.prev { margin-right: %spx; background: url("%s") left top no-repeat;}"""%(self.indentleft, linkres) if self.rolloverfiles and self.rolloverfiles[i] != "": menuleft += """#scrollable a.prev:hover { background-image: url("%s");}"""%(src.util.id.id2link1(self.rolloverfiles[i])) elif self.pagesid[i][1]=="menufooter": menuright ="""#scrollable a.next { margin-left: %spx; background: url("%s") left top no-repeat;}"""%(self.indentright, linkres) if self.rolloverfiles and self.rolloverfiles[i] != "": menuright += """#scrollable a.next:hover {background-image: url("%s");}"""%(src.util.id.id2link1(self.rolloverfiles[i])) else: if self.pagesid[i][0] == "": link_render_1 = "" link_render_2 = "" else: # link_render_1 = """"""%self.pagesid[i][0] # obsolete - page_guid.vdom link_render_1 = """"""%request.application().search_object(self.pagesid[i][0]).name link_render_2 = "" if current_sel==self.pagesid[i][0]: linkres = src.util.id.id2link1(str(self.selectedfiles[i])) onmouse="" # representation = """"""%(linkres,onmouse,self.pagesid[i][1],self.imgwidth[i]) representation = """"""%(linkres,onmouse,self.pagesid[i][1],self.imgwidth[i]) menuitem_img += link_render_1+representation+link_render_2 w_r = int(self.footwidth) + int(self.indentright) w_l = int(self.headwidth) + int(self.indentleft) styleimg="""height: %spx;"""%(self.imgheight[1]) result = ""\ ""\ ""\ ""\ ""\ ""\ "

"%(w_l,styleimg,menuitem_img,w_r) mainstyle="z-index: %s;position: %s;top: %spx;left: %spx; width: %spx; height: %spx;overflow:hidden;"%(self.zindex, self.position, self.top, self.left, self.width, self.headheight) id = 'o_' + (self.id).replace('-', '_') cssstyle=""""""%(self.headheight,self.headwidth,menuleft,menuright) script = """""" return "
%s %s
%s"%(id,mainstyle,cssstyle, result,script) else: return "" def wysiwyg(self, parent, contents=""): w=int(self.width) h=int(self.height) head="" foot="" picts="" empty = "" img_for_crop = [] w_cur=int(self.indentleft)+int(self.indentright)+int(self.headwidth)+int(self.footwidth) if self.imgheight: h =int(self.imgheight[0]) if w < w_cur: self.width = str(w_cur) w = w_cur result = """"""%(self.id, self.zindex,w,h, self.top, self.left) result += """"""%(0,0,w,h) if self.menufooter and self.menuheader: result +=""%h max = len(self.imagefiles) for k in xrange(0,max): pict_html=""\ ""\ ""\ ""%(int(self.imgwidth[k]),self.imagefiles[k],0,0) if self.pagesid[k][1]=="menuheader": p_lcell=""%(int(self.imgwidth[k])+ int(self.indentleft)) head = p_lcell + pict_html elif self.pagesid[k][1]=="menufooter": p_rcell=""%(int(self.imgwidth[k])+int(self.indentright)) foot = p_rcell + pict_html else: w_cur+=int(self.imgwidth[k]) if w_cur <= w: p_cell=""%(int(self.imgwidth[k])) picts += p_cell + pict_html else: w_cur = w_cur - int(self.imgwidth[k]) img_for_crop.append(self.imagefiles[k]) w_empty = w - w_cur if w_empty >= 1 and img_for_crop: label = "%s_%s_%s" %(img_for_crop[0],w_empty,h) resource = src.resource.resource_manager.get_resource_by_label(img_for_crop[0], label) if resource: img_crop = resource.id else: im2 = VDOM_imaging() im2.load(request.application_id,img_for_crop[0]) im2.crop(0,0,int(w_empty),int(h)) img_crop = im2.save_temporary(request.application_id,self.id,label) empty = ""\ ""\ ""\ ""\ ""%(w_empty,w_empty,img_crop,0,0) result += head + picts + empty + foot + "" result += "
" result += "" return VDOM_object.wysiwyg(self, parent, contents=result)
